channel.title: Admins can't drop anything?
channel.description: I know really nooby question lol, just upgraded from 317 to 639. On my base it doesn't allow admins to drop items. How can I make it where admins can drop items?

item.title: Admins can't drop anything?
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

Okey, good luck. I tried.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins can't drop anything?
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

[quote=“nickog15, post:3, topic:444908”]I did a quick sweep, could not find it.
@Pest - You got that from another website-.- Don’t try to act smart.
Quick thought - Why do you want admins to drop items? Admins could drop admin only items or something, or they can spawn gold and drop it. The person put that code in there for a reason.[/quote]

Being an admin on my server is a big deal lol, I trust very few with having it. And I would like admins to be able 2 drop because well, its just something I want them to be able 2 do lol.

Read full topic
